page.title: 10SECONDARY SCHOOL,HURWORTH.
page.content: Hurworth Comprehensive School has about six hundred pupils, aged between eleven and sixteen years. The teaching staff consist of a Headteacher and thirty five Assistant teachers. There are also six assistants to the cook, a caretaker, assistant caretaker and six cleaners,a laboratory technician and one full-time and one part-time clerical assistant. The children study for their C.S.E. and "O" level examin- ations. The children live in Hurworth,Neasham and Middleton St. George. Some pupils come from the south east of Darlington and about fifty per cent of all pupils bus to school. Most of the extra-curricular activit- ies are held at lunch time. There is an enormous choice each day, including games,art and crafts of all kinds,as well as conservation,library & drama.
